title: New client: ETA mins 0.0mb/0.0mb
body:
After losing a game, i was unable to move my mouse from the centre of the screen and could not click continue
I had to go on task manager and close it myself
When i attempt to go onto league again it shows me a message:
We have restored an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try patch it up to the latest version
I click okay, but then it shows 'eta mins 0.0mb /0.0 mb'
Please help

replies.body: yes i have the same problem but with me when i opened the cleint it said we cant log u in cuz  u may be offline so i deleted the game and redownloaded it then i did set it up but after the setup when i open it it gives me the eta mins 0.0mb/0.0mb please help
This happened to me, now I can't patch.

Mine looks like this, it's literally going nowhere.

http://puu.sh/sptXR/1933fdde23.jpg

Give it some time, sometimes it takes a bit to start. If this continues, you can try the steps below:

>* Delete your \RADS\solutions\league_client_sln folder if one exists in your League install
* Delete all but your "installer" folder in \RADS\projects\league_client\releases directory
* Run \RADS\projects\league_client\releases\installer\deploy\LeagueClient.exe

Let me know if this helped!
Hey I tried this but whenever I deleted them the client would restart and reinstall them.
Hey I changed my client language in the settings but now for some reason it says the client has to update and it’s stuck at 0.0 MB is there anything I can do to fix it ?
Same thing. Had to go back to the old launcher and use the admin version to log back into the game
